navbar__search__type__movie.description: Label for the movie search type

navbar__search__type__show.description: Label for the show search type

navbar__search__type__episode.description: Label for the episode search type

navbar__search__type__person.description: Label for the person search type

navbar__search__text.description: Label for the search escape switch text

navbar__search__query.description: Label for the search escape switch query

navbar__search__tooltip_header.message: In query mode, some characters have special meanings

navbar__search__tooltip_including.message: Indicates that the term must be present in the result.
navbar__search__tooltip_including.description: Search query tooltip for the including keywords (+)

navbar__search__tooltip_excluding.message: Indicates that the term must not be present in the result.
navbar__search__tooltip_excluding.description: Search query tooltip for the excluding keywords (-)

navbar__search__tooltip_combining_and.message: Represents the logical AND operator, used to combine conditions.
navbar__search__tooltip_combining_and.description: Search query tooltip for the combining keywords (&&)

navbar__search__tooltip_combining_or.message: Represents the logical OR operator, used to specify alternatives.
navbar__search__tooltip_combining_or.description: Search query tooltip for the combining keywords (||)

navbar__search__tooltip_negating.message: Represents the logical NOT operator, used to exclude results.
navbar__search__tooltip_negating.description: Search query tooltip for the negating keywords (!)

navbar__search__tooltip_grouping.message: Used for grouping terms and control the order of evaluation.
navbar__search__tooltip_grouping.description: Search query tooltip for the grouping keywords ()

navbar__search__tooltip_ranges.message: Used to specify character ranges ([] with boundary, {} without)
navbar__search__tooltip_ranges.description: Search query tooltip for the ranges keywords [] {}

navbar__search__tooltip_boosting.message: Used for boosting the relevance of a term.
navbar__search__tooltip_boosting.description: Search query tooltip for the boosting keywords (^)

navbar__search__tooltip_escaping.message: Indicates an exact case sensitive search.
navbar__search__tooltip_escaping.description: Search query tooltip for the escaping keywords (")

navbar__search__tooltip_fuzzy.message: Indicates a fuzzy search where matching strategy is relaxed.
navbar__search__tooltip_fuzzy.description: Search query tooltip for the fuzzy match keywords (~)

navbar__search__tooltip_wildcard.message: Wildcard operator, matches any number of characters within a term.
navbar__search__tooltip_wildcard.description: Search query tooltip for the wildcard match keywords (*)

navbar__search__tooltip_wildcard_single.message: Wildcard operator, matches any single character within a term.
navbar__search__tooltip_wildcard_single.description: Search query tooltip for the wildcard match keywords (*)

navbar__search__tooltip_field.message: Separates field names from field values in a query.
navbar__search__tooltip_field.description: Search query tooltip for the field match keywords (:)

navbar__search__tooltip_regex.message: Used for searching using regular expressions.
navbar__search__tooltip_regex.description: Search query tooltip for the regex keywords (/)

navbar__search__option_group_match.description: Label for the search option group match

navbar__search__option_group_recent.description: Label for the search option group recent
